publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2240.2.1 Murdo Fraser: Make Poverty Historyâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S2M-2240.2) in the name of Patricia Ferguson, insert at end "; recognises, in particular, the way in which the voluntary sector and indeed private individuals have responded so swiftly to the unfolding tragedy, and recognises the need for continued efforts from individuals, the voluntary sector and government."
